49 #define COLUMN_WIDTH 14
50 
51 // Defines a value that can be printed
52 struct OutputQuantity {
53  std::string name;
54  std::string units;
55  std::string description;
56 
57  OutputQuantity(
58  const std::string& n, const std::string& u, const std::string& d)
59  : name(n), units(u), description(d)
60  { }
61 };
62 
63 // List of all mixture output quantities
64 #define NMIXTURE 46
65 OutputQuantity mixture_quantities[NMIXTURE] = {
66  OutputQuantity("Th", "K", "heavy particle temperature"),
67  OutputQuantity("P", "Pa", "pressure"),
68  OutputQuantity("B", "T", "magnitude of magnetic field"),
69  OutputQuantity("rho", "kg/m^3", "density"),
70  OutputQuantity("nd", "1/m^3", "number density"),
71  OutputQuantity("Mw", "kg/mol", "molecular weight"),
72  OutputQuantity("Cp_eq", "J/mol-K", "equilibrium specific heat at constant pressure"),
73  OutputQuantity("H", "J/mol", "mixture enthalpy"),
74  OutputQuantity("S", "J/mol-K", "entropy"),
75  OutputQuantity("Cp_eq", "J/kg-K", "equilibrium specific heat at constant pressure"),
76  OutputQuantity("H", "J/kg", "mixture enthalpy"),
77  OutputQuantity("H-H0", "J/kg", "mixture enthalpy minus the enthalpy at 0K"),
78  OutputQuantity("S", "J/kg-K", "entropy"),
79  OutputQuantity("Cv_eq", "J/kg-K", "equilibrium specific heat at constant volume"),
80  OutputQuantity("Cp", "J/mol-K", "frozen specific heat at constant pressure"),
81  OutputQuantity("Cv", "J/mol-K", "frozen specific heat at constant volume"),
82  OutputQuantity("Cp", "J/kg-K", "frozen specific heat at constant pressure"),
83  OutputQuantity("Cv", "J/kg-K", "frozen specific heat at constant volume"),
84  OutputQuantity("gam_eq", "", "equilibrium ratio of specific heats"),
85  OutputQuantity("gamma", "", "frozen ratio of specific heat"),
86  OutputQuantity("Ht", "J/mol", "translational enthalpy"),

112  OutputQuantity("Eam", "V/K", "ambipolar electric field (SM Ramshaw)"),

123 #define NSPECIES 19
124 OutputQuantity species_quantities[NSPECIES] = {
125  OutputQuantity("X", "", "mole fractions"),

138  OutputQuantity("J", "kg/m^2-s", "Species diffusion fluxes (SM Ramshaw)"),

150  OutputQuantity("kb", "mol,m,s,K", "backward reaction rate coefficients")
151 };

154 #define NOTHER 10
155 OutputQuantity other_quantities[NOTHER] = {
156  OutputQuantity("Dij", "m^2/s", "multicomponent diffusion coefficients"),
157  OutputQuantity("pi_i", "", "element potentials"),
158  OutputQuantity("N_p", "mol", "phase moles"),
159  OutputQuantity("iters", "", "number of continuation step iterations"),
160  OutputQuantity("newts", "", "total number of newton iterations"),
161  OutputQuantity("Fp_k", "kg/m-Pa-s", "elemental diffusion fluxes per pressure gradient"),
162  OutputQuantity("Ft_k", "kg/m-K-s", "elemental diffusion fluxes per temperature gradient"),

164  OutputQuantity("sigmaB", "S/m", "anisotropic electric conductivity"),
165  OutputQuantity("lamB_e", "W/m-K", "anisotropic electron thermal conductivity")
166 };

168 // Simply stores the command line options
169 typedef struct {
170  double T1;
171  double T2;
172  double dT;
173 
174  double P1;
175  double P2;
176  double dP;
177  double B;
178 
179  std::vector<int> mixture_indices;
180  std::vector<int> species_indices;
181  std::vector<int> reaction_indices;
182  std::vector<int> other_indices;
183 
184  bool verbose;
185  bool header;
186 
187  Mutation::MixtureOptions* p_mixture_opts;
188 
189  bool use_scientific;
190  int precision;
191 } Options;
192 
193 // Checks if an option is present
194 bool optionExists(int argc, char** argv, const std::string& option)
195 {
196  return (std::find(argv, argv+argc, option) != argv+argc);
197 }
198 
199 // Returns the value associated with a particular option
200 std::string getOption(int argc, char** argv, const std::string& option)
201 {
202  std::string value;
203  char** ptr = std::find(argv, argv+argc, option);
204 
205  if (ptr == argv+argc || ptr+1 == argv+argc)
206  value = "";
207  else
208  value = *(ptr+1);
209 
210  return value;
211 }
212 
213 
214 // Prints the program's usage information and exits.
215 void printHelpMessage(const char* const name)
216 {
217  std::string tab(" ");
218 
219  cout.setf(std::ios::left, std::ios::adjustfield);
220 
221  cout << endl;
222  cout << "Usage: " << name << " [OPTIONS] mixture" << endl;
223  cout << "Compute equilibrium properties for mixture over a set of "
224  << "temperatures and pressures using the Mutation++ library." << endl;
225  cout << endl;
226  cout << tab << "-h, --help prints this help message" << endl;
227  cout << tab << " --no-header no table header will be printed" << endl;
228  cout << tab << "-T temperature range in K \"T1:dT:T2\" or simply T (default = 300:100:15000 K)" << endl;
229  cout << tab << "-P pressure range in Pa \"P1:dP:P2\" or simply P (default = 1 atm)" << endl;
230  cout << tab << "-B magnitude of the magnetic field in teslas (default = 0 T)" << endl;
231  cout << tab << "-m list of mixture values to output (see below)" << endl;
232  cout << tab << "-s list of species values to output (see below)" << endl;
233  cout << tab << "-r list of reaction values to output (see below)" << endl;
234  cout << tab << "-o list of other values to output (see below)" << endl;
235  cout << tab << " --species-list instead of mixture name, use this to list species in mixture" << endl;
236  cout << tab << " --elem-x set elemental mole fractions (ex: N:0.8,O:0.2)" << endl;
237  cout << tab << " --elem-comp set elemental composition with a name from the mixture file" << endl;
238  cout << tab << " --thermo-db overrides thermodynamic database type (NASA-7, NASA-9, RRHO)" << endl;
239  cout << tab << " --scientific outputs in scientific format with given precision" << endl;
240  //cout << tab << "-c element fractions (ie: \"N:0.79,O:0.21\")" << endl;
241  cout << endl;
242  cout << "Mixture values (example format: \"1-3,7,9-11\"):" << endl;
243 
244  for (int i = 0; i < NMIXTURE; ++i)
245  cout << tab << setw(2) << i << ": " << setw(10)
246  << mixture_quantities[i].name << setw(12)
247  << (mixture_quantities[i].units == "" ? "[-]" :
248  "[" + mixture_quantities[i].units + "]")
249  << mixture_quantities[i].description << endl;
250 
251  cout << endl;
252  cout << "Species values (same format as mixture values):" << endl;
253 
254  for (int i = 0; i < NSPECIES; ++i)
255  cout << tab << setw(2) << i << ": " << setw(10)
256  << species_quantities[i].name << setw(12)
257  << (species_quantities[i].units == "" ? "[-]" :
258  "[" + species_quantities[i].units + "]")
259  << species_quantities[i].description << endl;
260 
261  cout << endl;
262  cout << "Reaction values (same format as mixture values):" << endl;
263 
264  for (int i = 0; i < NREACTION; ++i)
265  cout << tab << setw(2) << i << ": " << setw(10)
266  << reaction_quantities[i].name << setw(12)
267  << (reaction_quantities[i].units == "" ? "[-]" :
268  "[" + reaction_quantities[i].units + "]")
269  << reaction_quantities[i].description << endl;
270 
271  cout << endl;
272  cout << "Other values (same format as mixture values):" << endl;
273 
274  for (int i = 0; i < NOTHER; ++i)
275  cout << tab << setw(2) << i << ": " << setw(10)
276  << other_quantities[i].name << setw(12)
277  << (other_quantities[i].units == "" ? "[-]" :
278  "[" + other_quantities[i].units + "]")
279  << other_quantities[i].description << endl;
280 
281  cout << endl;
282  cout << "Example:" << endl;
283  cout << tab << name << " -T 300:100:15000 -P 101325 -m 1-3,8 air_11" << endl;
284  cout << endl;
285 
286  exit(0);
287 }
288 
289 // Parses a temperature or pressure range
290 bool parseRange(const std::string& range, double& x1, double& x2, double& dx)
291 {
292  std::vector<std::string> tokens;
293  String::tokenize(range, tokens, ":");
294 
295  if (!String::isNumeric(tokens))
296  return false;
297 
298  switch (tokens.size()) {
299  case 1:
300  x1 = atof(tokens[0].c_str());
301  x2 = x1;
302  dx = 1.0;
303  break;
304  case 3:
305  x1 = atof(tokens[0].c_str());
306  x2 = atof(tokens[2].c_str());
307  dx = atof(tokens[1].c_str());
308  break;
309  default:
310  return false;
311  }
312 
313  if (dx == 0.0) {
314  x2 = x1;
315  dx = 1.0;
316  }
317 
318  return true;
319 }
320 
321 // Parses an index list of the form 1-3,7,9 for example
322 bool parseIndices(const std::string& list, std::vector<int>& indices, int max)
323 {
324  indices.clear();
325 
326  std::vector<std::string> ranges;
327  std::vector<std::string> bounds;
328  String::tokenize(list, ranges, ",");
329 
330  std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator iter = ranges.begin();
331  for ( ; iter != ranges.end(); ++iter) {
332  bounds.clear();
333  String::tokenize(*iter, bounds, "-");
334 
335  if (!String::isNumeric(bounds))
336  return false;
337 
338  switch (bounds.size()) {
339  case 1: {
340  int i = atoi(bounds[0].c_str());
341  if (i < 0 || i > max)
342  return false;
343  indices.push_back(atoi(bounds[0].c_str()));
344  break;
345  }
346  case 2: {
347  int i1 = atoi(bounds[0].c_str());
348  int i2 = atoi(bounds[1].c_str());
349 
350  if (i1 >= i2 || i1 < 0 || i1 > max || i2 > max)
351  return false;
352 
353  for (int i = i1; i <= i2; ++i)
354  indices.push_back(i);
355 
356  break;
357  }
358  default:
359  return false;
360  }
361  }
362 
363  return true;
364 }
365 
366 // Parse the command line options to determine what the user wants to do
367 Options parseOptions(int argc, char** argv)
368 {
369  Options opts;
370 
371  // Print the help message and exit if desired
372  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-h") || optionExists(argc, argv, "--help"))
373  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
374 
375  // Control verbosity
376  opts.verbose =
377  optionExists(argc, argv, "-v") || optionExists(argc, argv, "--verbose");
378 
379  // Check if the header should be printed or not
380  opts.header = !optionExists(argc, argv, "--no-header");
381 
382  // The mixture name is given as the only argument (unless --species option
383  // is present)
384  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "--species-list")) {
385  opts.p_mixture_opts = new Mutation::MixtureOptions();
386  opts.p_mixture_opts->setSpeciesDescriptor(getOption(argc, argv, "--species-list"));
387  } else {
388  opts.p_mixture_opts = new Mutation::MixtureOptions(argv[argc-1]);
389  }
390 
391  // Must use the equilibirum state model
392  opts.p_mixture_opts->setStateModel("Equil");
393 
394  // Elemental mole fractions
395  bool comp_set = false;
396  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "--elem-x")) {
397  comp_set = true;
398  opts.p_mixture_opts->addComposition(
399  Thermodynamics::Composition(getOption(argc, argv, "--elem-x").c_str()),
400  true
401  );
402  }
403 
404  // Elemental composition
405  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "--elem-comp")) {
406  if (comp_set) {
407  cout << "Only one method of setting element composition can be used!" << endl;
408  exit(1);
409  }
410  std::string comp = getOption(argc, argv, "--elem-comp");
411  if (!opts.p_mixture_opts->setDefaultComposition(comp.c_str())) {
412  cout << "Composition " << comp << " does not exist in the mixture!" << endl;
413  exit(1);
414  }
415  }
416 
417  // Thermodynamic database
418  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "--thermo-db")) {
419  opts.p_mixture_opts->setThermodynamicDatabase(
420  getOption(argc, argv, "--thermo-db"));
421  }
422 
423  // Get the temperature range
424  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-T")) {
425  if (!parseRange(
426  getOption(argc, argv, "-T"), opts.T1, opts.T2, opts.dT)) {
427  cout << "Bad format for temperature range!" << endl;
428  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
429  }
430  } else {
431  opts.T1 = 300.0;
432  opts.T2 = 15000.0;
433  opts.dT = 100.0;
434  }
435 
436  // Get the pressure range
437  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-P")) {
438  if (!parseRange(
439  getOption(argc, argv, "-P"), opts.P1, opts.P2, opts.dP)) {
440  cout << "Bad format for pressure range!" << endl;
441  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
442  }
443  } else {
444  opts.P1 = ONEATM;
445  opts.P2 = ONEATM;
446  opts.dP = ONEATM;
447  }
448 
449  // Get the magnetic field strength
450  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-B")) {
451  opts.B = atof(getOption(argc, argv, "-B").c_str());
452  } else {
453  opts.B = 0.0;
454  }
455 
456  // Get the mixture properties to print
457  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-m")) {
458  if (!parseIndices(
459  getOption(argc, argv, "-m"), opts.mixture_indices, NMIXTURE-1)) {
460  cout << "Bad format for mixture value indices!" << endl;
461  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
462  }
463  }
464 
465  // Get the species properties to print
466  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-s")) {
467  if (!parseIndices(
468  getOption(argc, argv, "-s"), opts.species_indices, NSPECIES-1)) {
469  cout << "Bad format for species value indices!" << endl;
470  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
471  }
472  }
473 
474  // Get the reaction properties to print
475  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-r")) {
476  if (!parseIndices(
477  getOption(argc, argv, "-r"), opts.reaction_indices, NREACTION-1)) {
478  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
479  }
480  }
481 
482  // Get the other properties to print
483  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "-o")) {
484  if (!parseIndices(
485  getOption(argc, argv, "-o"), opts.other_indices, NOTHER-1)) {
486  cout << "Bad format for other value indices!" << endl;
487  printHelpMessage(argv[0]);
488  }
489  }
490 
491  // Check for output format
492  if (optionExists(argc, argv, "--scientific")) {
493  opts.use_scientific = true;
494  opts.precision = atoi(getOption(argc, argv, "--scientific").c_str());
495  } else {
496  opts.use_scientific = false;
497  opts.precision = 0;
498  }
499 
500  // If
501 
502  return opts;
503 }
504 
505 // Write out the column headers
506 void writeHeader(
507  const Options& opts, const Mutation::Mixture& mix,
508  std::vector<int>& column_widths)
509 {
510  std::string name;
511  int width = (opts.use_scientific ? opts.precision + 8 : COLUMN_WIDTH);
512 
513  std::vector<int>::const_iterator iter = opts.mixture_indices.begin();
514  for ( ; iter != opts.mixture_indices.end(); ++iter) {
515  name = mixture_quantities[*iter].name +
516  (mixture_quantities[*iter].units == "" ?
517  "" : "[" + mixture_quantities[*iter].units + "]");
518  column_widths.push_back(
519  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
520  if (opts.header)
521  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
522  }
523 
524  iter = opts.species_indices.begin();
525  for ( ; iter != opts.species_indices.end(); ++iter) {
526  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i) {
527  name = "\"" + species_quantities[*iter].name + "_" + mix.speciesName(i) +
528  (species_quantities[*iter].units == "" ?
529  "" : "[" + species_quantities[*iter].units + "]") + "\"";
530  column_widths.push_back(
531  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
532  if (opts.header)
533  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
534  }
535  }
536 
537  iter = opts.reaction_indices.begin();
538  for ( ; iter != opts.reaction_indices.end(); ++iter) {
539  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nReactions(); ++i) {
540  char buff [10];
541  sprintf(buff, "%d", i);
542  name = reaction_quantities[*iter].name + "_" + buff +
543  (reaction_quantities[*iter].units == "" ?
544  "" : "[" + reaction_quantities[*iter].units + "]");
545  column_widths.push_back(
546  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
547  if (opts.header)
548  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
549  }
550  }
551 
552  iter = opts.other_indices.begin();
553  for ( ; iter != opts.other_indices.end(); ++iter) {
554  if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "Dij") {
555  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i) {
556  for (int j = 0; j < mix.nSpecies(); ++j) {
557  name = "D_{" + mix.speciesName(i) + "," + mix.speciesName(j)
558  + "}";
559  column_widths.push_back(
560  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
561  if (opts.header)
562  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
563  }
564  }
565  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "pi_i") {
566  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nElements(); ++i) {
567  name = "pi_" + mix.elementName(i);
568  column_widths.push_back(
569  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
570  if (opts.header)
571  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
572  }
573  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "N_p") {
574  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nPhases(); ++i) {
575  std::stringstream ss;
576  ss << "N_p" << i; ss >> name;
577  column_widths.push_back(
578  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
579  if (opts.header)
580  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
581  }
582  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "iters") {
583  column_widths.push_back(width);
584  if (opts.header)
585  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "iters";
586  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "newts") {
587  column_widths.push_back(width);
588  if (opts.header)
589  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "newts";
590  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "Fp_k") {
591  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nElements(); ++i) {
592  std::stringstream ss;
593  ss << "Fp_" << mix.elementName(i) << "[kg/m-Pa-s]"; ss >> name;
594  column_widths.push_back(
595  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
596  if (opts.header)
597  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
598  }
599  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "Ft_k") {
600  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nElements(); ++i) {
601  std::stringstream ss;
602  ss << "Ft_" << mix.elementName(i) << "[kg/m-K-s]"; ss >> name;
603  column_widths.push_back(
604  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
605  if (opts.header)
606  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
607  }
608  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "Fz_k") {
609  for (int l = 0; l < mix.nElements(); ++l) {
610  for (int k = 0; k < mix.nElements(); ++k) {
611  std::stringstream ss;
612  ss << "F(" << mix.elementName(l) << ")_" <<
613  mix.elementName(k) << "[kg/m-s]"; ss >> name;
614  column_widths.push_back(
615  std::max(width, static_cast<int>(name.length())+2));
616  if (opts.header)
617  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << name;
618  }
619  }
620  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "sigmaB") {
621  column_widths.push_back(std::max(width, 10));
622  if (opts.header)
623  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "sig_par";
624  column_widths.push_back(std::max(width, 10));
625  if (opts.header)
626  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "sig_perp";
627  column_widths.push_back(std::max(width, 10));
628  if (opts.header)
629  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "sig_tran";
630  } else if (other_quantities[*iter].name == "lamB_e") {
631  column_widths.push_back(std::max(width, 10));
632  if (opts.header)
633  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "lamB_par";
634  column_widths.push_back(std::max(width, 10));
635  if (opts.header)
636  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "lamB_perp";
637  column_widths.push_back(std::max(width, 10));
638  if (opts.header)
639  cout << setw(column_widths.back()) << "lamB_tran";
640  }
641  }
642 
643  if (opts.header)
644  cout << endl;
645 }
646 
647 
664 int main(int argc, char** argv)
665 {
666 #ifdef _GNU_SOURCE
667  // Enable floating point exception handling
668  feenableexcept(FE_DIVBYZERO | FE_INVALID | FE_OVERFLOW);
669 #endif
670 
671  // Parse the command line options and load the mixture
672  Options opts = parseOptions(argc, argv);
673  Mutation::Mixture mix(*opts.p_mixture_opts);
674  mix.setBField(opts.B);
675  delete opts.p_mixture_opts;
676 
677  // Write out the column headers (and compute the column sizes)
678  std::vector<int> column_widths;
679  writeHeader(opts, mix, column_widths);
680 
681  // Now we can actually perform the computations
682  std::vector<int>::const_iterator iter;
683  double value;
684  int cw;
685  std::string name, units;
686 
687  double* species_values = new double [mix.nSpecies()];
688  double* temp = new double [
689  std::max(mix.nSpecies(), mix.nElements()*mix.nElements())];
690  double* sjac_exact = new double [mix.nSpecies()*mix.nSpecies()];
691  double* sjac_fd = new double [mix.nSpecies()*mix.nSpecies()];
692  double* temp2 = new double [mix.nSpecies()];
693  double* reaction_values = new double [mix.nReactions()];
694 
695  /*ofstream jac_file("jac.dat");
696 
697  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
698  jac_file << setw(15) << mix.speciesName(i);
699  jac_file << endl;*/
700 
701  if (opts.use_scientific) {
702  cout.precision(opts.precision);
703  cout << std::scientific;
704  }
705 
706  for (double P = opts.P1; P <= opts.P2; P += opts.dP) {
707  for (double T = opts.T1; T <= opts.T2; T += opts.dT) {
708  // Compute the equilibrium composition
709  mix.setState(&P, &T, 1);
710  cw = 0;
711 
712  // Mixture properties
713  iter = opts.mixture_indices.begin();
714  for ( ; iter < opts.mixture_indices.end(); ++iter) {
715  name = mixture_quantities[*iter].name;
716  units = mixture_quantities[*iter].units;
717 
718  if (name == "Th")
719  value = mix.T();
720  else if (name == "P")
721  value = mix.P();
722  else if (name == "B")
723  value = mix.getBField();
724  else if (name == "rho")
725  value = mix.density();
726  else if (name == "nd")
727  value = mix.numberDensity();
728  else if (name == "Mw")
729  value = mix.mixtureMw();
730  else if (name == "H") {
731  if (units == "J/mol")
732  value = mix.mixtureHMole();
733  else if (units == "J/kg")
734  value = mix.mixtureHMass();
735  } else if (name == "H-H0") {
736  value = mix.mixtureHMinusH0Mass();
737  } else if (name == "S") {
738  if (units == "J/mol-K")
739  value = mix.mixtureSMole();
740  else if (units == "J/kg-K")
741  value = mix.mixtureSMass();
742  } else if (name == "Cp") {
743  if (units == "J/mol-K")
744  value = mix.mixtureFrozenCpMole();
745  else if (units == "J/kg-K")
746  value = mix.mixtureFrozenCpMass();
747  } else if (name == "Cp_eq") {
748  if (units == "J/mol-K")
749  value = mix.mixtureEquilibriumCpMole();
750  else if (units == "J/kg-K")
751  value = mix.mixtureEquilibriumCpMass();
752  } else if (name == "Cv") {
753  if (units == "J/mol-K")
754  value = mix.mixtureFrozenCvMole();
755  else if (units == "J/kg-K")
756  value = mix.mixtureFrozenCvMass();
757  } else if (name == "Cv_eq") {
758  value = mix.mixtureEquilibriumCvMass();
759  } else if (name == "gam_eq")
760  value = mix.mixtureEquilibriumGamma();
761  else if (name == "gamma")
762  value = mix.mixtureFrozenGamma();
763  else if (name == "mu")
764  value = mix.viscosity();
765  else if (name == "lambda")
766  value = mix.equilibriumThermalConductivity();
767  else if (name == "lam_reac")
768  value = mix.reactiveThermalConductivity();
769  else if (name == "lam_bb")
770  value = mix.butlerBrokawThermalConductivity();
771  else if (name == "lam_soret")
772  value = mix.soretThermalConductivity();
773  else if (name == "lam_int")
774  value = mix.internalThermalConductivity(T);
775  else if (name == "lam_h")
776  value = mix.heavyThermalConductivity();
777  else if (name == "lam_e")
778  value = mix.electronThermalConductivity();
779  else if (name == "sigma")
780  value = mix.electricConductivity();
781 // else if (name == "sigma_para")
782 // value = mix.sigmaParallel();
783 // else if (name == "sigma_perp")
784 // value = mix.sigmaPerpendicular();
785 // else if (name == "sigma_trans")
786 // value = mix.sigmaTransverse();
787  else if (name == "Ht") {
788  mix.speciesHOverRT(temp, species_values);
789  value = 0.0;
790  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
791  value += species_values[i] * RU * T * mix.X()[i];
792  if (units == "J/kg")
793  value /= mix.mixtureMw();
794  } else if (name == "Hr") {
795  mix.speciesHOverRT(temp, NULL, species_values);
796  value = 0.0;
797  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
798  value += species_values[i] * RU * T * mix.X()[i];
799  if (units == "J/kg")
800  value /= mix.mixtureMw();
801  } else if (name == "Hv") {
802  mix.speciesHOverRT(temp, NULL, NULL, species_values);
803  value = 0.0;
804  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
805  value += species_values[i] * RU * T * mix.X()[i];
806  if (units == "J/kg")
807  value /= mix.mixtureMw();
808  } else if (name == "Hel") {
809  mix.speciesHOverRT(temp, NULL, NULL, NULL, species_values);
810  value = 0.0;
811  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
812  value += species_values[i] * RU * T * mix.X()[i];
813  if (units == "J/kg")
814  value /= mix.mixtureMw();
815  } else if (name == "Hf") {
816  mix.speciesHOverRT(
817  temp, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, species_values);
818  value = 0.0;
819  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
820  value += species_values[i] * RU * T * mix.X()[i];
821  if (units == "J/kg")
822  value /= mix.mixtureMw();
823  } else if (name == "e") {
824  if (units == "J/mol")
825  value = mix.mixtureEnergyMole();
826  else if (units == "J/kg")
827  value = mix.mixtureEnergyMass();
828  } else if (name == "a_f")
829  value = mix.frozenSoundSpeed();
830  else if (name == "a_eq")
831  value = mix.equilibriumSoundSpeed();
832  else if (name == "Eam") {
833  mix.dXidT(temp);
834  mix.stefanMaxwell(temp, temp2, value);
835  } else if (name == "drho/dP")
836  value = mix.dRhodP();
837  else if (name == "l")
838  value = mix.meanFreePath();
839 // else if (name == "le")
840 // value = mix.electronMeanFreePath();
841 // else if (name == "Vh")
842 // value = mix.averageHeavyThermalSpeed();
843 // else if (name == "Ve")
844 // value = mix.electronThermalSpeed();
845 // else if (name == "tau_eh")
846 // value = mix.electronHeavyCollisionFreq();
847 // else if (name == "tau_a")
848 // value = mix.averageHeavyCollisionFreq();
849 
850  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << value;
851  }
852 
853  // Species properties
854  iter = opts.species_indices.begin();
855  for ( ; iter < opts.species_indices.end(); ++iter) {
856  name = species_quantities[*iter].name;
857  units = species_quantities[*iter].units;
858 
859  if (name == "X")
860  std::copy(mix.X(), mix.X()+mix.nSpecies(), species_values);
861  else if (name == "dX/dT")
862  mix.dXidT(species_values);
863  else if (name == "Y")
864  std::copy(mix.Y(), mix.Y()+mix.nSpecies(), species_values);
865  else if (name == "rho") {
866  std::copy(mix.Y(), mix.Y()+mix.nSpecies(), species_values);
867  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
868  species_values[i] *= mix.density();
869  } else if (name == "conc") {
870  double conc = mix.density() / mix.mixtureMw();
871  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
872  species_values[i] = mix.X()[i] * conc;
873  } else if (name == "Cp") {
874  mix.speciesCpOverR(species_values);
875  if (units == "J/mol-K")
876  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
877  species_values[i] *= RU;
878  else if (units == "J/kg-K")
879  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
880  species_values[i] *= (RU / mix.speciesMw(i));
881  } else if (name == "H") {
882  mix.speciesHOverRT(species_values);
883  if (units == "J/mol")
884  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
885  species_values[i] *= (RU * T);
886  else if (units == "J/kg")
887  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
888  species_values[i] *= (RU * T / mix.speciesMw(i));
889  } else if (name == "S") {
890  mix.speciesSOverR(species_values);
891  if (units == "J/mol-K")
892  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
893  species_values[i] *= RU;
894  else if (units == "J/kg-K")
895  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
896  species_values[i] *= (RU / mix.speciesMw(i));
897  } else if (name == "G") {
898  mix.speciesGOverRT(species_values);
899  if (units == "J/mol")
900  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
901  species_values[i] *= (RU * T);
902  else if (units == "J/kg")
903  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
904  species_values[i] *= (RU * T / mix.speciesMw(i));
905  } else if (name == "J") {
906  double E, rho;
907  mix.dXidT(temp);
908  mix.stefanMaxwell(temp, species_values, E);
909  rho = mix.density();
910  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
911  species_values[i] *= rho * mix.Y()[i];
912  } else if (name == "omega") {
913  mix.netProductionRates(species_values);
914  } else if (name == "Omega11") {
915  int k = mix.hasElectrons() ? 1 : 0;
916  if (k == 1)
917  species_values[0] = mix.collisionDB().Q11ee();
918  Map<ArrayXd>(species_values+k, mix.nHeavy()) =
919  mix.collisionDB().Q11ii();
920  } else if (name == "Omega22") {
921  int k = mix.hasElectrons() ? 1 : 0;
922  if (k == 1)
923  species_values[0] = mix.collisionDB().Q22ee();
924  Map<ArrayXd>(species_values+k, mix.nHeavy()) =
925  mix.collisionDB().Q22ii();
926  } else if (name == "Chi^h") {
927  mix.heavyThermalDiffusionRatios(species_values);
928  } else if (name == "Dm") {
929  mix.averageDiffusionCoeffs(species_values);
930  }
931 
932  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
933  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << species_values[i];
934  }
935 
936  // Reaction properties
937  iter = opts.reaction_indices.begin();
938  for ( ; iter < opts.reaction_indices.end(); ++iter) {
939  name = reaction_quantities[*iter].name;
940 
941  if (name == "kf")
942  mix.forwardRateCoefficients(reaction_values);
943  else if (name == "kb")
944  mix.backwardRateCoefficients(reaction_values);
945 
946  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nReactions(); ++i)
947  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << reaction_values[i];
948  }
949 
950  // Other properties
951  iter = opts.other_indices.begin();
952  for ( ; iter < opts.other_indices.end(); ++iter) {
953  name = other_quantities[*iter].name;
954 
955  if (name == "Dij") {
956  const Eigen::MatrixXd& Dij = mix.diffusionMatrix();
957  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
958  for (int j = 0; j < mix.nSpecies(); ++j)
959  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << Dij(i,j);
960  } else if (name == "pi_i") {
961  mix.elementPotentials(species_values);
962  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nElements(); ++i)
963  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << species_values[i];
964  } else if (name == "N_p") {
965  mix.phaseMoles(species_values);
966  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nPhases(); ++i)
967  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << species_values[i];
968  } else if (name == "iters") {
969  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << mix.nEquilibriumSteps();
970  } else if (name == "newts") {
971  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << mix.nEquilibriumNewtons();
972  } else if (name == "Fp_k") {
973  mix.equilDiffFluxFacsP(temp);
974  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nElements(); ++i)
975  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << temp[i];
976  } else if (name == "Ft_k") {
977  mix.equilDiffFluxFacsT(temp);
978  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nElements(); ++i)
979  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << temp[i];
980  } else if (name == "Fz_k") {
981  mix.equilDiffFluxFacsZ(temp);
982  for (int k = 0; k < mix.nElements()*mix.nElements(); ++k)
983  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << temp[k];
984  } else if (name == "sigmaB") {
985  Eigen::Vector3d sigma = mix.electricConductivityB();
986  for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
987  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << sigma(i);
988  } else if (name == "lamB_e") {
989  Eigen::Vector3d lambda = mix.electronThermalConductivityB();
990  for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
991  cout << setw(column_widths[cw++]) << lambda(i);
992  }
993  }
994 
995  cout << endl;
996 
997  // Compute the exact jacobian
998  /*double conc = mix.density() / mix.mixtureMw();
999  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)

1002 
1003  // Now compute the finite-differenced jacobian
1004  double eps = std::sqrt(Numerics::NumConst<double>::eps);
1005  double delta, prev;

1009  prev = temp[j];

1011  mix.netProductionRates(mix.T(), temp, temp2);

1014  sjac_fd[i*mix.nSpecies()+j] = (temp2[i]-species_values[i])/
1015  (delta*mix.speciesMw(j));
1016  }
1017

1020  double x;

1022  for (int j = 0; j < mix.nSpecies(); ++j) {
1023  jac_file << setw(15)
1024  //<< (sjac_fd[i*mix.nSpecies()+j] -
1025  // sjac_exact[i*mix.nSpecies()+j]) /
1026  // sjac_exact[i*mix.nSpecies()+j];
1027  << sjac_exact[i*mix.nSpecies()+j];
1028 
1029  // Compute the Frobenius norm of the difference matrix
1030  //x = sjac_exact[i*mix.nSpecies()+j] - sjac_fd[i*mix.nSpecies()+j];
1031  //sum1 += x*x;
1032  //x = sjac_exact[i*mix.nSpecies()+j];
1033  //sum2 += x*x;
1034  }
1035  jac_file << endl;
1036  }
1037  //jac_file << setw(10) << mix.T() << setw(15) << std::sqrt(sum1/sum2);
1038  jac_file << endl;*/
1039  }
1040  }
1041 
1042  // Clean up storage
1043  delete [] species_values;
1044  delete [] temp;
1045  delete [] sjac_exact;
1046  delete [] sjac_fd;
1047  delete [] temp2;
1048  delete [] reaction_values;
1049 
1050  return 0;
1051 }

Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics::mixtureHMinusH0Mass
double mixtureHMinusH0Mass()
Returns the mixture averaged enthalpy minus the enthalpy of the mixture at 0K with.

Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics::mixtureEnergyMass
